docs.lead_paragraph: Alisha Nazir Bhagat and Mark David Egerman are to be married Sunday at the Mayflower Hotel in Washington. Rabbi Alan Ullman will officiate. On Friday, a Nikah ceremony, a Muslim ceremony, was performed by Sheikh Zohair Indorewala at the Doubletree Hotel Crystal City in Arlington, Va.

docs.lead_paragraph: Armed with journalism degrees, twins from Ohio moved to New York in search of a job. More than a year later, they’re still looking.

headline.seo: For Twins in New York, a Long Struggle in a Tough Job Market
headline.main: Jobs Wanted, Any Jobs at All
headline.sub: When they’re not sending out  résumés, two young women  find ways to sustain themselves:  baby-sitting, dog walking, bartending.;

docs.snippet: Armed with journalism degrees, twins from Ohio moved to New York in search of a job. More than a year later, they’re still looking.

docs.lead_paragraph: Last week, President Obama held just one health care event in public, when he stood in the Rose Garden with white-coated doctors from every state. On the dais with him were physicians from Maine, Nebraska, Arkansas and Florida -- all states with senators whom Mr. Obama is courting. ''These states were not picked out of a hat,'' Dan Pfeiffer, deputy director of communications at the White House, said in an interview, laughing.

headline.main: President's Approach To Selling Health Care Becomes More Focused

docs.abstract: Pres Obama's campaign for health care overhaul has entered new, more focused phase, aimed at securing votes of 60 senators and holding together coalition of wary industry groups; largely backroom process is being blended with stage-managed public events with allies; current polls suggest public has not yet been won over to overhaul health insurance system; photo (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: This Sunday's talk shows are almost all about the war in Afghanistan, but the Obama administration is conspicuously absent from the discussions. At a time when President Obama is considering whether to deploy thousands more troops to the region, current and former Republican advisers are coming out of the woodwork to support sending more troops to Afghanistan.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration is trying to build a sense of momentum for a health care overhaul by portraying such legislation as inevitable while portraying Republican opponents in Congress as isolated.

headline.main: New D.N.C. Ad Spotlights Republican Support for Health Care Bills

docs.abstract: A new commercial capitalizes on the backing offered by Republicans outside Congress for health care legislation.
docs.snippet: A new commercial capitalizes on the backing offered by Republicans outside Congress for health care legislation.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Congressional Oversight Panel, created last year to keep tabs on taxpayer bailout funds, said the Obama administration’s program would prevent fewer than half of predicted foreclosures.

headline.main: Panel Says Obama Plan Won’t Slow Foreclosures

docs.lead_paragraph: With little money, G.O.P. candidates for public advocate and city comptroller are campaigning the old-fashioned way: giving speeches and shaking hands, one by one.
